attributes.title: 2009 Volkswagen Golf GTI 2.0T FSI Auto

attributes.description:
The Dzire gives you comfort and design flowing seamlessly through classic sedan styling. Touches of silver in its black interior tie the look together, giving you affordable luxury that gets attention. The spacious cabin frees up your movement while the ergonomically-placed controls allow you to enjoy every drive.

Get the Dzire experience you prefer: *Auto Gear Shift features an intelligent shift-control actuator, automatically controlling the shift and clutch. This system creates an easy, direct-drive feel, and boosts fuel-efficiency. The Dzire’s 5-Speed Manual Transmission offers an optimal gear ratio for the engine and drivetrain, balancing your fuel-efficiency and power performance perfectly.

Give in, get in, and drive.

*GL Model Only

attributes.description:
As a first of its kind, with over three decades of constant improvement in design and performance, the Vitara name has blazed the way forward for compact SUVs. Now, four generations later, the all-new Vitara Brezza defies all the odds and continues to deliver on the exceptional.

 

The Vitara Brezza’s contemporary design pays homage to the Vitara’s Compact SUV heritage. The brawny exterior is adorned with a touch of modern pizzazz. The Vitara Brezza’s 1.5?  engine is perfectly coupled with a premium and sporty luxury-fitted cabin to make sure your drive isn’t just good, it is the best.
